title: Patriots, Aaron Rodgers, Steelers, CFB rankings, & where colin was right & wrong
itunes:title: Patriots, Aaron Rodgers, Steelers, CFB rankings, & where colin was right & wrong
description:
Colin discusses why the New England Patriots will win the AFC, the firing of Green Bay Packers HC Mike McCarthy, why QB Aaron Rodgers is difficult to work with, the problems with the Pittsburgh Steelers, the CFB rankings, and where he was right and wrong over the weekend. Guests include Michael Vick, Peter King, Joel Klatt, Greg Jennings, and Trent Dilfer.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
